TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Found some bits of a former you then thought hey why not create a imperial steam powered robotic Military.*Commands them to take the west coast of the U.s ,and Asia (including Russia)* I managed to mass produce these Imperial troops.Not to mention the factories were on the west coast of the United states.

Dude, remember what Satcharna and Odin said about this kind of stuff?

So, what if we were Proxies of Slenderman? What will happen?

Raises eyebrow*

No

Explain the proxy concept, this is the first I've heard of it.

Proxies are people who are being controlled by Slenderman. Look it up on the Slenderman Wiki. More info there.
so wibbley wobbly.0_o

Found some bits of a former you then thought hey why not create a imperial steam powered robotic Military.*Commands them to take the west coast of the U.s ,and Asia (including Russia)* I managed to mass produce these Imperial troops.Not to mention the factories were on the west coast of the United states.

Ah, clever but there's a hole in your theory...

...I'm the ONLY humanoid RageSeries WarMech ever.

*MGUARN's army implodes on itself after reality warps in*

so wibbley wobbly.0_o

Looks like it was a .gif of Slenderman killing someone.
I see, thank you. I assume I'd be rather useless for any combat or sentry-related duties, but if he needs physics done for whatever reason, I guess I'd be somewhat useful.

Looks like it was a .gif of Slenderman killing someone.

Actually, Alex, the friend of jay turned proxy killed him, walked off, and And the Operator took the body.

@satcharna: Well, no. Because you no longer know anything about physics. The Operator controls you to do WHAT ever he needs.

If he finds interest in you, you become a proxy, if he doesn't...you die.
Imagine if Slenderman ruled the world......... Awful. We would all be proxies. Either that, or he would kill us with Masky.

Imagine if Slenderman ruled the world......... Awful. We would all be proxies. Either that, or he would kill us with Masky.

*BZZZT* wrong because in the latest episode of Marble Hornets Masky=Tim and is currently helping Jay! Masky isn't a proxy and Neither is Hoodie. Only Alex is a proxy.

*BZZZT* wrong because in the latest episode of Marble Hornets Masky=Tim and is currently helping Jay! Masky isn't a proxy and Neither is Hoodie. Only Alex is a proxy.

Hope they kill the Operator/Slenderman.

Nope! you can't kill him!

#trollface.

Hey, I'm a medic not a miracle worker.

And I'm an engineer not a doctor. But I can at least handle the basic stuff likely to be encountered when dealing with sharp edged machine parts and live electrical equipment.

*Star Trek-ish reference!*

^w^

Mercy? I think ilu <3

Space. The final frontier.

I see, thank you. I assume I'd be rather useless for any combat or sentry-related duties, but if he needs physics done for whatever reason, I guess I'd be somewhat useful.

You're still one more pair of eyes watching the horizon for carbombs driven by insurgents towards the camp, or unwelcome drones looking for hostile troops to attack.
Yeah, no, not really. xD Can barely see at all.
NEW TOPIC: How can a new space race be started to get the government interested in space exploration again?

Did the Slenderman discussion end? YAY~

I was distracted, installing old (ish) games on my laptop.
Well, how can a new Space Race be started?

All we'd need for that would be some competing between nations again. Another cold war, so to speak. The main reason for the old space race was bragging rights. Soviet wanted to "conquer space" for propaganda, and murrica wanted to beat them to it.

Now, there's not really much competition between space-capable countries, and so there's no inspiration for putting people on Mars or whatever. Luckily, Russia has a decent budget dedicated to it, and several private ventures are also somewhat well funded, so something might spark up again in the future.
Maybe once we get Earth-bound business sorted out...Nah, that's not happening.

All we'd need for that would be some competing between nations again. Another cold war, so to speak. The main reason for the old space race was bragging rights. Soviet wanted to "conquer space" for propaganda, and murrica wanted to beat them to it.

Now, there's not really much competition between space-capable countries, and so there's no inspiration for putting people on Mars or whatever. Luckily, Russia has a decent budget dedicated to it, and several private ventures are also somewhat well funded, so something might spark up again in the future.

True. I hope SpaceX lands on Mars one day. If NASA won't do it, they will.
Yes, I like that there are so many private company's making space accessible to the masses
Yes, because the average person can easily go into space now.

Yes, I like that there are so many private company's making space accessible to the masses

Add "Trying to" in between "companies" and "making". and change "Making" to "make" that's more accurate.

Yes, because the average person can easily go into space now.

Eventually that will be possible. Virgin Galactic is working on it.
Is this the wrong place to admit I'm not a fan of space exploration?
